settings.heading: How is this different from other supplements I've tried?
settings.description:
Most supplements only try to boost testosterone production. That's not your problem if you have belly fat ‚Äî the problem is conversion. Your belly fat is converting whatever testosterone you have into estrogen. 

Dryft‚Ñ¢ is the only formula that attacks all three pathways: blocking estrogen conversion, targeting visceral belly fat, AND supporting natural testosterone levels. It's a multi-pathway approach that addresses the root cause.

settings.heading: Why does belly fat make it harder to lose weight?
settings.description: Belly fat contains high levels of an enzyme called aromatase. This enzyme converts testosterone into estrogen. Higher estrogen signals your body to store MORE fat ‚Äî especially around the belly. This creates a vicious cycle that willpower and dieting alone can't break.
